Uses of Class
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.MemorylessSolution

  • Packages that use MemorylessSolution 
    Package Description
    org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game  

    • Uses of MemorylessSolution in org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

      Methods in org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game that return MemorylessSolution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemorylessSolution RecursiveSolver.getWinningRegions(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      Solves a subgame of a parity game.
      MemorylessSolution DominionDecompositionSolver.newWin(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      This method implements the new-win procedure in Figure 7.1 in [JPZ08].
      MemorylessSolution DominionDecompositionSolver.oldWin(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      This method implements the old-win procedure in Figure 7.1 in [JPZ08] but the parity condition is min-even.
      static MemorylessSolution GameUtil.projectSolution(Game game, Solution<MemorylessStrategy> solution)
      Returns a memoryless solution for a specified game based on another memoryless solution.
      MemorylessSolution RecursiveSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution McNaughtonZielonkaSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution GlobalOptimizationSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution DominionDecompositionSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution DeadEndSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution ClassicalBuchiSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution BigStepSolver.solve(Game game, StateSet subgame) 
      MemorylessSolution McNaughtonZielonkaSolver.win(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      Solves a subgame of a parity game.
      MemorylessSolution ClassicalBuchiSolver.win(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      Returns a subgame's solution of a Büchi game.
      MemorylessSolution DeadEndSolver.winDeads(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      Returns a subgame's solution where the strategy of a player can lead the play ends at a dead end of its opponent.
      MemorylessSolution BigStepSolver.winningRegions(Game game, StateSet subgame)
      This method corresponds to the procedure Winning-Regions in the paper except that for 3-color subgames, this method computes the strategies for both players immediately.
